secret_rule: Only things that start with Za.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Zucchini" and "Zamboni".
Can I bring a Zebra to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring a Zebra.
Player: Can I bring a Zipper to the picnic?
Yes, you can bring a Zipper.
Player: Can I bring a Zoo to the picnic?
No, you cannot bring a Zoo.
Player: Can I bring a Zephyr to the picnic?
Yes, you can bring a Zephyr.
Player: Can I bring a Zircon to the picnic?
Yes, you can bring a Zircon.
The rule appears to be that you can only bring items to the picnic that are inanimate objects starting with the letter 'Z'.
Correct! The rule is Only things that start with Za.
